name: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
bio: Aerospace scientist and the 11th President of India, known as the Missile Man of India.

name: Dr. B. R. Ambedkar
bio: Architect of the Indian Constitution and a social reformer who campaigned against untouchability.

name: Sachin Tendulkar
bio: Legendary Indian cricketer often referred to as the 'Master Blaster'.

name: Sarojini Naidu
bio: Freedom fighter and poet known as the Nightingale of India.

name: Rabindranath Tagore
bio: First Asian Nobel Laureate and composer of the Indian national anthem.
